title: [Health] Early Smartphone Exposure Linked to Poor Mental Health: Global Study Reveals Alarming Findings

[Medicine] Residual insomnia in major depressive disorder is common. A systematic review shows Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-I), Mindfulness-Based Cognitive Therapy (MBCT), behavioral activation (BA) and pharmacological methods (gabapentin, clonazepam) mitigate residual insomnia.
